Job Title: Visa Counselor

Job Overview:Are you passionate about guiding individuals through their international journey? Join Global Visa Internationals in Bangalore as a Visa Counselor. In this client-facing role, you‚Äôll assist applicants with visa procedures, documentation, and eligibility assessments. This position is perfect for candidates looking to build a career in visa consultancy in Bangalore or grow in the immigration services industry.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Guide clients through visa requirements, processes, and documentation for various countries.
  • Evaluate applicant profiles and suggest suitable visa options.
  • Handle walk-in inquiries, telephonic leads, and email queries professionally.
  • Coordinate with the documentation team to ensure timely application processing.
  • Maintain and update client records.
  • Provide end-to-end support to clients from consultation to visa approval.

Qualifications & Skills:

  • Experience: Freshers are welcome (Training will be provided)
  • Excellent English communication skills (verbal and written)
  • Proficient in MS Office (Word, Excel, Outlook)
  • Strong interpersonal and counseling skills
  • Ability to build trust and rapport with clients
  • Detail-oriented with good organizational skills
  • Goal-driven and proactive approach to work
  • Team player with a positive attitude
  • Gender: Female candidates preferred
  • Educational Qualification: Any degree (preferred in Business, Marketing, or Humanities)
